name: Timesh- Pre Alpha
description:
Timesh is a roguelike advenure where we enter the Tower of Time with 5 different and unique characters, facing numerous challenges to recover what they loved the most. 

We are still developing the product and the final version may vary from this. If you are interested, you can check out our news in Twitter.

If you have any feedback that want to give us to improve anything of the game, we will gladly take that into account during the development. We want to share the product with the community before it is finished so we can adapt to the feedback we receive.
